meanings.sent1: The cat's unconcealed excitement was evident in its wagging tail.
meanings.sent2: The unconcealed joy on her face showed how happy she was.
meanings.sent3: The unconcealed surprise on his birthday was a delight to see.
meanings.sent4: Her unconcealed kindness shone brightly in her actions.
meanings.sent5: The unconcealed beauty of the sunset took everyone's breath away.

meanings.sent1: The unconcealed truth was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent2: His unconcealed disappointment was clear from his frown.
meanings.sent3: The unconcealed mess in the room made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unconcealed stars in the night sky twinkled above.
meanings.sent5: The unconcealed talent of the young artist amazed the audience.
